meanings.definition: Involving or relating to two or more different leagues.
meanings.sent1: The interleague tournament included teams from both the city and the suburbs.
meanings.sent2: The interleague matches brought together players from various regions.
meanings.sent3: The interleague championship was a mix of excitement and nerves.
meanings.sent4: The interleague collaboration resulted in a successful partnership.
meanings.sent5: The interleague event showcased the diversity of talent across leagues.

meanings.definition: A game or competition between teams from different leagues.
meanings.sent1: The interleague baseball game was a thrilling showdown between the city team and the rural team.
meanings.sent2: Fans eagerly awaited the interleague soccer match between the top teams.
meanings.sent3: The interleague basketball tournament had everyone on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent4: The interleague chess competition was a battle of wits between the best players.
meanings.sent5: The interleague race brought together runners from all over the country.
